id: {Player} {_Random:leaves the hunters to fend for themselves|abandons the hunters|turns his back on the hunters}

onSuccess.displayText:
{Player} vanished into the depths of the forest, leaving the hunters to deal with the {Monster1} by themselves. As he ran deeper into the wilds, the sounds of fire and battle faded away behind him. Soon enough, only silence remained.

Unbeknownst to him, however, the hunters would be saved by an {Kingdom#Adjective} knight who was patrolling the forest that day. Days later, this knight would track {Player} down, introducing herself by the name of {Knight1}. {Player} would try to evade her grasp, but his underdeveloped magical powers were no match for a knight's professional training. After capturing {Player}, {Knight1} was determined to bring him to {Capital1}, the royal capital of the kingdom of {Kingdom#Name}. This long journey would take at least two whole months, during which, {Player} learns some rudimentary language skills from his captors.

However, just before the escort could reach {Capital1}, they were attacked by a {Monster2}, an aggressive magical beast with the body of a lion, and the head and wings of an eagle. During this attack, the {Monster2} killed all of the escorting men, gravely wounded {Knight1}, and tore a large hole in the cage where {Player} was held.
